title: Stephanie Grisham: "I'll Take Your Questions Now"
description: Michael speaks with former White House Press Secretary Stephanie Grisham, author of "I'll Take Your Questions Now: What I Saw In The Trump White House." Original air date 6 October 2021. The book was published on 5 October 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Stephanie Grisham)
